question: Kedarnath Singh, the renowned poet has passed away. He was associated with which language?
explanation: Kedarnath Singh (84), Jnanpith awardee and renowned Hindi poet, has passed away in New Delhi on March 19, 2018. He won the Sahitya Akademi Award in Hindi in 1989 for his poetry collection \'Akaal Mein Saras\' and the Jnanpith Award in 2013. He had been a professor and head of the Department of Hindi Language at Jawaharlal Nehru University\'s Indian Languages Centre.
